page.title: 16BARNS GREEN DRAMA GROUP
page.content: {THE DRAMA GROUP AND DRAMA FESTIVAL } THERE ARE 25 ADULT MEMBERS IN THE DRAMA GROUP.THE ADULT MEMBERS' GROUP IS CALLED BARNS GREEN PLAYERS.THE OLDEST MEMBER IS EDWARD BISCHOFF, HE IS IN HIS 70'S.THE LIGHTING IS DONE BY BARRY GROVES WITH HELP BY JOHN ATRIDGE THE MAKE-UP IS DONE BY SALLY CLARKE AND ANN JENNINGS.SALLY DOES THE STRAIGHT MAKE-UP,ANN DOES THE FANCY MAKE-UP.IT TAKES 3 TO 4 MONTHS TO COMPLETE A PRODUCTION INCLUDING THE REHEARSALS.THE WARDROBE MISTRESS IS JOYCE GROVES.{THE DRAMA FESTIVAL}IS HELD ONCE A YEAR,AT DIFFERENT DRAMA GROUPS.THIS YEAR IT WAS HELD IN BARNS GREEN VILLAGE HALL.LOTS OF DIFFERENT VILLAGES WITH DRAMA GROUPS EACH DO A PLAY FOR THE FESTIVAL THEY HAVE JUDGES TO SEE WHO IS THE BEST ACTOR OR ACTRESS.MRS JENNINGS WON IT THIS YEAR.
